title: The rise of agentic journalism
description: In 2026, a new type of journalism will emerge: one tailored explicitly to machine compilers of language and information. This journalism will not be directed at people, but rather at chatbots and AI information summarizers. A journalism for the “agentic web”: a web populated by automated agents that serve us, retrieving information, sharing our data,...
